data.title: Explore Savage Global Marketing’s career opportunities
data.meta_description: Embark on a thrilling career with Savage Global Marketing. Be part of our creative family, where your talent shines and contributes to groundbreaking marketing success.
data.text:
Savage Global Marketing is currently seeking a Social Media/Content Director for our Fort Lauderdale based Marketing Agency. You will be responsible for all social media content, posting and blog related content. Majority of our clients are Marine, Automotive, & E-commerce. You will work with our Strategy Director to ensure the content is creative, unique, and stands out from the crowd…like we do.

Savage Global Marketing is currently seeking a Client Coordinator/Admin for our Fort Lauderdale based Marketing Agency. You will be responsible for all client requests, upgrades, updates, or changes. You will coordinate and participate in client meetings both in office and on the phone. This will require you to be in close contact with our team members in order to maintain our quality standards. A majority of our clients are Marine, Automotive, & E-commerce.

You will coordinate and participate in client meetings both in office and on the phone. This will require you to be in close contact with our team members in order to maintain our quality standards. A majority of our clients are Marine, Automotive, & E-commerce.

We are looking for a talented and confident front-end web designer & developer to join our Fort Lauderdale team. The ideal candidate should have great design skills and responsive design experience. We all work together as a close-knit team – collaboration is what makes us.

Please send us your resume along with past work portfolio / samples / etc. Provide links to live samples of your work or a portfolio with offline examples of websites and design.

Be prepared for an in-person or web interview where you will be able to show and discuss examples of your work.
